title: Ariel Winter poses on Instagram amid Levi Meaden split rumours
text:
She has always had an eye for fashion. And Ariel Winter indulged her love of clothes in a photo-shoot she posted to her Instagram page on Wednesday.

The 21-year-old Modern Family star posed up in a splotch print pink skirt with a busty white sleeveless top for her latest post.

This post comes nearly two weeks after UsWeekly claimed the Sofia The First star has split from her beau of three years, Levi Meaden, 32.

Small screen star: Ariel Winter indulged her love of clothes in a photo-shoot she posted to her Instagram page on Wednesday

Winter looked stunning in her new social media post.

She relied on the expertise of styling team Dani and Emma, who have worked with her before, as well as makeup whiz Ash K Holm.

As far as Meaden, Ariel has yet to comment on the 'split.'

Amid all the conjecture, Ariel and Levi were glimpsed hugging warmly outside a studio in North Hollywood this past Sunday.

Before that embrace, the Hollywood hot couple had not been pictured together since August and Ariel was seen out to lunch with a mystery man.

Only the best: She relied on the expertise of styling team Dani and Emma, who have worked with her before, as well as makeup whiz Ash K Holm

She told Refinery29 in 2017 of her romance with Levi, with its dramatic age gap: 'I'm happy, and whatever people want to say, they can say.'

Said she: 'I don't understand why someone would even comment on our situation at all. There are tons of people of all ages that live with their boyfriend.'

Conversely: 'There are tons of people that live with their girlfriends, [and] tons of people that don't live together and are super happy. But I'm super happy in the arrangement that we have. We love living together. It's just great.'

The TV starlet said: 'I have to say he is the most incredible person I've ever met and that I'm so lucky to be with him.'

Conjecture: The TV actress has famously had a live-in romance with 32-year-old actor Levi Meaden, but there is now a swirl of rumors that they have split

Ariel, whose shape had already drawn its share of online trolling, said: 'He's always complimenting me and making me feel special and beautiful.'

The actress has been playing acerbic teen Alex Dunphy on Modern Family since its first season began airing on ABC in 2009.

Modern Family's 11th and current season has been announced as its last, and it broadcast its premiere on September 25.
description: She has always had an eye for fashion. And Ariel Winter indulged her love of clothes in a photo-shoot she posted to her Instagram page on Wednesday.
